# accessibilityAddTraits(_:)

**Instance Method**

Adds the given traits to the view.

## Declaration

```swift
nonisolated func accessibilityAddTraits(_ traits: AccessibilityTraits) -> ModifiedContent<Self, AccessibilityAttachmentModifier>
```

## Assigning traits to content

- **accessibilityRemoveTraits(_:)**: Removes the given traits from this view.
- **AccessibilityTraits**: A set of accessibility traits that describe how an element behaves.

items.description: Removes the given traits from this view.
